Ann,
 
Don't apologise and don't be sucked in!
she's a spy and a crap stir=
rer, the less she is here the better.
 
She has no concern for the research=
 or how it is conducted. Her only goal is to
cause disention whithin the gr=
oup.
 
So maybe if we don't pay attention to her she will go back where she=
 came from.
Also she can not post any box files because she does not have a=
ny.
 
bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: lisby@earthl=
ink.netDate: Mon, 21 Jan 2008 16:49:43 -0500Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Babs=
 has Issues!




If I misunderstood, then I certainly apologize.  

Perhaps=
 we'd react differently if you participated here more often--posting your o=
wn files and asking questions of researchers. For example, "Hey, Ann--that =
file you just posted, I hear what you do, but is anything clipped out of it=
? I think I hear a track silenced, too. If so, why did you do that?" Then I=
 get to answer and explain why I did it that way, offer the raw clip, or wh=
atever. It doesn't come off as a broad attack--just a friendly question. Ev=
en Bruce wouldn't rip out your living eyeballs for that. (Well... maybe he =
wouldn't, anyway. ;) ) 

I agree with your search for The Truth. I really d=
o. That's why you see me get all rough-and-tumble over stuff like the Lumin=
ator when I think it is it lacking convincing evidence. But it's waaaaaay t=
oo early in "boxology" to try to make it perform as a pet circus animal. He=
ll, we've been studying traditional EVP for 30 years and it still won't per=
form on cue for the scientists or anyone else. But if you just listen to wh=
at you get on your own and what all the others are getting, it becomes very=
 clear indeed that a real phenomenon is occurring. Sure, some things we get=
 that we think are paranormal may be just radio fragments, but one radio fr=
agment does not negate all box communication. One tweaked clip is not indic=
ative of a culture of researcher deceit. One "I am Bazoozoo! Time to fry, f=
oolish mortal!" does not mean that the RS hacks are pathways to Satan's ind=
oor plumbing. There are no easy answers yet--and there may never be any. An=
d I'm not sure we're at the stage yet where we have the right to demand The=
 Truth or whether we would even see it if it was staring us in the face.

A=
ll right, enough joy in myself one-hand clapping.

LC is right that if you =
want to try to pursue this in the way you want to pursue it, then you need =
to find some people who share your mindset and go to it. I don't think you'=
re going to find those people here, necessarily--at least among the old gua=
rd. We're the beatniks in black leather, smoking ciggies and reading bad po=
etry to the beat of bongos, HMO.

Ann
 


On Jan 21, 2008, at 1:37 PM, babi=
arz3 wrote:




Just to clear things up.. the file I'm referring to is not =
from anyoneinvolved in this group so when I say that occasionally I hear th=
eirvoices become shaky, that is not a comment on anyone here. Also,please d=
on't misread what I actually said. The point I made, or triedto make, about=
 the investigators not hearing what I heard... Iwouldn't have heard all of =
it in real time either. Too many layers,too fast, etc. I have the luxury no=
w of sitting and analyzing the filein my own time. As for fear being a fact=
or... I do believe that the attitude of theinvestigators present during a s=
ession does effect the outcome. EvenBruce who would rather cut my eyeballs =
out with a razor has said thesame. If you think that I am scared, fine. If =
I'm missing one thing itis probably a healthy dose of fear. Don't make the =
mistake of missingthe points by name calling. I post my thoughts here becau=
se it is an active group of peopleworking with this form of ITC. You can ca=
ll me a shit stirrer orwhatever you want. The point is that I see issues th=
at could beaddressed fairly easily. You can ignore it or deflect all you wa=
nt.For me, it's not about being friends, it's about the research. --- In EV=

ious?!> > Frank R.> > ----- Original Message ----> From: Lisby <lisby@...>>=

Ann,<BR>
 <BR>
Don't apologise and don't be sucked in!<BR>=

she's a spy and a crap stirrer, the less she is here the better.<BR>
&nbsp=
;<BR>
She has no concern for the research or how it is conducted. Her only =
goal is to<BR>
cause disention whithin the group.<BR>
 <BR>
So maybe i=
f we don't pay attention to her she will go back where she came from.<BR>
A=
lso she can not post any box files because she does not have any.<BR>

<HR>

<DIV id=3DEC=
_ygrp-text>
If I misunderstood, then I certainly apologize.  
<DIV><BR=
 class=3DEC_webkit-block-placeholder></DIV>
<DIV>Perhaps we'd react differe=
ntly if you participated here more often--posting your own files and asking=
 questions of researchers. For example, "Hey, Ann--that file you just =
posted, I hear what you do, but is anything clipped out of it? I think I he=
ar a track silenced, too. If so, why did you do that?" Then I get to a=
nswer and explain why I did it that way, offer the raw clip, or whatever. I=
t doesn't come off as a broad attack--just a friendly question. Even Bruce =
wouldn't rip out your living eyeballs for that. (Well... maybe he wouldn't,=
 anyway. ;) ) 
<DIV><BR class=3DEC_webkit-block-placeholder></DIV>
<DIV>I a=
gree with your search for The Truth. I really do. That's why you see me get=
 all rough-and-tumble over stuff like the Luminator when I think it is it l=
acking convincing evidence. But it's waaaaaay too early in "boxology" to tr=
y to make it perform as a pet circus animal. Hell, we've been studying trad=
itional EVP for 30 years and it still won't perform on cue for the scientis=
ts or anyone else. But if you just listen to what you get on your own and w=
hat all the others are getting, it becomes very clear indeed that a real ph=
enomenon is occurring. Sure, some things we get that we think are paranorma=
l may be just radio fragments, but one radio fragment does not negate all b=
ox communication. One tweaked clip is not indicative of a culture of resear=
cher deceit. One "I am Bazoozoo! Time to fry, foolish mortal!" does not mea=
n that the RS hacks are pathways to Satan's indoor plumbing. There are no e=
asy answers yet--and there may never be any. And I'm not sure we're at the =
stage yet where we have the right to demand The Truth or whether we would e=
ven see it if it was staring us in the face.</DIV>
<DIV><BR class=3DEC_webk=
it-block-placeholder></DIV>
<DIV>All right, enough joy in myself one-hand c=
lapping.</DIV>
<DIV><BR class=3DEC_webkit-block-placeholder></DIV>
<DIV>LC =
is right that if you want to try to pursue this in the way you want to purs=
ue it, then you need to find some people who share your mindset and go to i=
t. I don't think you're going to find those people here, necessarily-<WBR>-=
at least among the old guard. We're the beatniks in black leather, smoking =
ciggies and reading bad poetry to the beat of bongos, HMO.</DIV>
<DIV><BR c=
lass=3DEC_webkit-block-placeholder></DIV>
<DIV>Ann</DIV>
<DIV> <BR>
<D=
IV>
<DIV>
